content.text:
# Draft:Lewis Howard

Lewis Howard (1919-1951) was an actor in the United States.
He shot himself to death at a Broadway shooting gallery.
Filmography
*First Love (1939)
*A Little Bit of Heaven (1940)
*''It's a Date (1940)
*Hello, Sucker (1941)
*Horror Island (1941) as Thurman Coldwater
*Hallzapoppin' (1941) as Woody Taylor
*Meet the Chump (1941)
*I've Always Loved You (1946)
*I'm Nobody's Sweetheart Now (1940)
*Raiders of the Desert (1941)
*Up Goes Maisie (1946) as Bill Stuart
*Song of My Heart (1948)
*Feet of Clay'' (1960)?????
References
External links
